problem.title: The Challenge with Task Management
problem.description: Most of us struggle with staying organized. Here's what you face:

items.title: Forgotten Deadlines
items.description: Tasks slip through the cracks, and deadlines are missed. You're always playing catch-up.

items.title: Scattered Tasks
items.description: Tasks are scattered across notes, emails, and random apps. No central place to see what matters.

items.title: Unclear Priorities
items.description: Without clear priorities, everything feels urgent. You waste time on low-impact work.

items.title: Wasted Mental Energy
items.description: Managing tasks manually drains your focus. You're spending energy on organization, not on getting things done.

solution.title: The Solution: Clean Task Management
solution.description: Evolution of Todo gives you a simple, powerful dashboard to take control.
